g1.title: POSTGRESQL OPERATOR - Real PostgreSQL Integration
g1.description: Complete executePostgreSqlOperator() with pg client library, connection pooling, transactions, parameterized queries, retry logic, and health monitoring

g2.title: MYSQL OPERATOR - Real MySQL Integration
g2.description: Complete executeMySqlOperator() with mysql2 client, connection pooling, prepared statements, binary protocol, master/slave routing, query logging

g3.title: MONGODB OPERATOR - Real MongoDB Integration
g3.description: Complete executeMongoDbOperator() with official driver, replica sets, aggregation pipelines, GridFS, change streams, index management

g4.title: INFLUXDB OPERATOR - Real Time Series Database
g4.description: Complete executeInfluxDbOperator() with InfluxDB client, line protocol, Flux queries, batch writing, retention policies, streaming

g5.title: ELASTICSEARCH OPERATOR - Real Search Engine Integration
g5.description: Complete executeElasticsearchOperator() with official client, full-text search, index management, bulk operations, aggregations, cluster monitoring
